The Method descriptive interventional study , 28 PTNB randomly divide two group : Group 1 submit vibration technique Group 2 - acceleration expiratory flow , technique apply interval ten minute , Three consecutive day . The pain indicator evaluate accord PIPP scale three moment . For statistical analysis , Friedman test Variance Analysis apply , level significance adopt 5 % .
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Physiotherapy Change Premature Pain With Pneumonia
DOC.detailed_description: A descriptive , longitudinal , quantitative approach carry 28 preterm infant diagnosis pneumonia hospitalize NICU NICU Santa Casa de Misericórdia Foundation Pará ( FSCMPA ) participate study period July October 2016 . The research obey ethical principle Of Resolution 466/12 National Health Council ( CNS ) initiate approval Research Ethics Committee FSCMPA , opinion 1,690,842 . The selection criterion obtain collection data record newborn annotate standardized chart . Once include study , patient randomly divide two group 14 PTNB , premature group 1 submit vibration technique ( rhythmic rapid movement isometric contraction forearm , apply manually anterior chest region ) Of Group 2 acceleration expiratory flow ( soft compression thorax apply one hand low rib use ulnar border supramammary line ) . Both technique perform premature dorsal position , time expiratory phase , maximum duration 10 minute , day , three consecutive day , afternoon period physiotherapist . After procedure , aspiration upper airways premature infant perform . The pain indicator preterm infant ( PIPP ) two group evaluate three moment , application technique ( T1 ) , immediately application technique ( T2 ) 15 minute After completion ( T3 ) , researcher previously train blind regard procedure perform . PIPP multidimensional instrument evaluate pain indicator newborn use follow parameter : gestational age alertness ( contextual factor ) , heart rate peripheral oxygen saturation ( physiological indicator ) measure mean pulse oximeter Of brand ( Dixtal® ) three aspect facial mimetics ( behavioral factor ) . Their score may range 0 21 , score less equal 6 indicate absence pain , score 6 represent mild pain score high 12 indicate presence moderate severe pain .
DOC.criteria: Included study RNPT gender , low weight ( 1500 2500g ) normal weight ( 2500g ) . With clinical diagnosis pneumonia . Who spontaneous ventilation ( ambient air aid oxygen therapy ) . Agreed participate research , sign Informed Consent Form minor . Newborns gestational age great 37 week . With disease procedure cause pain newborn necrotizing enterocolitis , thoracotraumatis , thoracic abdominal drainage , umbilical catheter . Who less 72 hour Life birth weight less 1500g ( low weight extreme low weight ) . As well underwent invasive noninvasive mechanical ventilation . Sedated . With vasoactive drug medication interfere physiological parameter pain .
